title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 481 - Computation Of Tax
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 481 - Computation Of Tax

State Regulations
§ 481.1 - Method of computing tax
§ 481.2 - Election of method
§ 481.3 - Gross weight method, rate of tax
§ 481.4 - Gross weight method, tax on laden vehicles
§ 481.5 - Gross weight method, optional method of computing the tax on tractors and trailers
§ 481.6 - Gross weight method, tax on unladen vehicles
§ 481.7 - Gross weight method, meaning of unladen vehicles
§ 481.8 - Gross weight method, tax on truck-trailer combination
§ 481.9 - Unloaded weight method
§ 481.10 - Unloaded weight method, rate of tax
§ 481.11 - Taxable miles
§ 481.12 - Determination of mileage

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 481

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 509

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
